Package game.controller

package game.controller
Package of the controller class for Connect 4.

The controller handles the user input, modifies the model, and decides what the view should draw.

This package should contain the view and controller interfaces, since they are required to use the controller. For example, there could be different view packages in the future, which all implement IGame4GewinnView and use IGame4GewinnController.

Author:
Yohanes Kirana
  • Class
    Description
    Game4GewinnController
    A Controller implementation for a GUI view.
    GameState
    All possible game states.
    IGame4GewinnController
    The interface of a controller from the perspective of a view object.
    IGame4GewinnView
    this interface contains all necessary classes of a view to be usable by controller.
